attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to make a law giving our armed forces,from cadets to serving members of the armed forces the right to march or hold a parade throughout the uk,and to protect them with laws against the vile people who wish to demonstrate against them.
these men and women put their lives on the line for everyone,let us do our little bit for them.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

There are a number of similar petitions on the site: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Parades/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
